name: Wild Pew Pew
description:
Wild Pew Pew is a shooting game like no other ! The wild can be tough, especially when you don't get along with your teammate ! During a trip in the Grand Canyon with your best friend, you end up attacked by a group of bandit. Luckily, you and your friend thought about bringing guns to a knife fight ! But be carreful, your gun as a color that can only hurt the same color of ennemy. And when a bigger and badder ennemy appear... then it's time to yell : FUUU-SION ! HAA !

Game made during the GGJ 2022 - From 28th January to 30th January - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/wild-pewpew-2

Diane GEISLER - 3D Artist

Danial LALMI - FX Artist / UI Artist - https://daniallalmi.itch.io/

Jeanne DE PERTHUIS - 3D Artist / Anim

Patrick MASSENA - UI Designer / Sound Designer / Programmer -  https://platore.itch.io/

Léo BARBARY - Programmer - https://krinassie.itch.io/
